EmailTemplate.name: Sales Staff Opportunity Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Staff / SunPower Commercial Opportunity – {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [first name of com opp recipient],
I am pleased to present this commercial opportunity, pre-qualified by Sales Staff.
Opportunity Name: {!Opportunity.Name}
Link to Opportunity: https://sunpower1.force.com/{!Opportunity.Id}
Additional Notes from Qualification:
Within two (2) business days, please contact this opportunity and then change the PROJECT STAGE within the opportunity record to something other than New Prospect after engaging the customer – i.e. Qualification in Process.
Please continue to update the OPPORTUNITY INFORMATION section within the opportunity record as you progress with the prospect.
Thank you and we look forward to working with you on winning this commercial project!
SunPower Commercial Sales & Marketing
